Articles.Content:
My editing have zero chance to cause such extended problems, i belive is just a problem with 0.15 that must be addressed by the author.

You\'re probably right. I ended up having to take the rotors off my space station. This, however, made it light enough to get into kerbostationary orbit!
Version 0.15.2 doesn\'t seem to like this plugin.

Version 0.15.2 doesn\'t seem to like this plugin.

I had the same problem with earlier versions; it isn\'t 15.2 thats causing this.
This plugin isn\'t really needed anymore anyways; animation is now officially supported in KSP.

This plugin isn\'t really needed anymore anyways; animation is now officially supported in KSP.

It would be nice to get the parts converted. There aren\'t enough good lander legs out there.
Yeah, solar panels with PowerTech and legs as default legs whould work and be cool.

Hello,

Since i needed this plugin to work otherwise i could not have fun with KSP i managed to fix it for 0.15,

Bravo, Sir.

Maybe it\'s just me but i found the MJP lander legs near useless because on landing they sink into the ground more often than not.

But because they look so nice i set out to try and fix it, with success.

I manually edited the .dea file of MJPLeg1 to increase the size of the collider:
when i try to use the parts all it says is 'this part isn\'t avalible in this version of ksp' (i have version 0.15.2)

when i try to use the parts all it says is 'this part isn\'t avalible in this version of ksp' (i have version 0.15.2)

I have the same issue. Curious for answer.

Are you using MJP_0.4.1_FIX?

http://kerbalspaceprogram.com/forum/index.php?topic=9017.msg202404#msg202404

Have a bunch of cfgs in \PluginData\pksmultijointobject\?

improved version of MJPLeg1 with enlarged colliders: no more floating a couple of inches above the ground, and no sinking into the ground:

those are sexy legs

(MJPLeg1.cfg goes into \PluginData\pksmultijointobject\)
evry time i try to use the parts it says it is ot avalable in version any advice.
Using the version linked in the post above you?
I really recommend you to host your mod on mediafire or a similar site, since dropbox will freeze your account once too many people download it from there.

o.O why doesnt work on 0.15.2 ' i need help

sry for my english XD
